channel.title: cshotton tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from cshotton.

item.description: @UAWeapons I don't think it missed. There seems to be a smoking hole on the second tank on the side opposite the DM-22 and the crew seems to be bailing out at the end.
item.source:markdown: @UAWeapons I don't think it missed. There seems to be a smoking hole on the second tank on the side opposite the DM-22 and the crew seems to be bailing out at the end.

item.description: @b05crypto At least the swing states change occasionally. Kinda like those rotating seats on the UN Security Council. But NY, CA, FL, and TX would be permanent members.
item.source:markdown: @b05crypto At least the swing states change occasionally. Kinda like those rotating seats on the UN Security Council. But NY, CA, FL, and TX would be permanent members.

item.description: @pants Jack Black and his Saxoboom as inspiration, I'm sure!
item.source:markdown: @pants Jack Black and his Saxoboom as inspiration, I'm sure!

item.description: @thexiv @b05crypto And he lost the 2016 popular vote by almost 2 million votes. So yeah, let's see how you come up with "70%", please!
item.source:markdown: @thexiv @b05crypto And he lost the 2016 popular vote by almost 2 million votes. So yeah, let's see how you come up with "70%", please!

item.description: @thexiv @b05crypto Funny how that's not true. Trump lost the popular vote in 2020 by 7.5 million votes. Or did you miss that part?
item.source:markdown: @thexiv @b05crypto Funny how that's not true. Trump lost the popular vote in 2020 by 7.5 million votes. Or did you miss that part?

item.description: @b05crypto That means presidents will only have to care about campaigning in NY, CA, FL, TX, and maybe PA or OH. Is that really what we want? Because I'd like a president that cares about stuff from the other 45 states, too.
item.source:markdown: @b05crypto That means presidents will only have to care about campaigning in NY, CA, FL, TX, and maybe PA or OH. Is that really what we want? Because I'd like a president that cares about stuff from the other 45 states, too.

item.description: @onewayfunction @semenov_roman_ @github That's a clearer way to say it. Your previous comment was ambiguous and seemed to imply that Github had some moral or legal obligation to host it. They're Microsoft, so you know that's not the case...
item.source:markdown: @onewayfunction @semenov_roman_ @github That's a clearer way to say it. Your previous comment was ambiguous and seemed to imply that Github had some moral or legal obligation to host it. They're Microsoft, so you know that's not the case...

item.description: @Joe_Cicala It DOES beg the question of just what did happen to the salami....
item.source:markdown: @Joe_Cicala It DOES beg the question of just what did happen to the salami....

item.description: @siegel I drove a manual transmission car for the first 17 years of my driving career. After flinging untold numbers of ice cream cones into the floorboard while shifting, I'm happy to have 2 more free appendages. Three if autopilot is behaving.
item.source:markdown: @siegel I drove a manual transmission car for the first 17 years of my driving career. After flinging untold numbers of ice cream cones into the floorboard while shifting, I'm happy to have 2 more free appendages. Three if autopilot is behaving.

item.description: @b05crypto Unless @AndrewYang has some inside info on what those documents contain, he should sit quietly and wait for the other shoe to drop. Given Trump's close ties to Saudi Arabia and Russia, who knows? He could have been selling them those documents or sharing them with golf buddies.
item.source:markdown: @b05crypto Unless @AndrewYang has some inside info on what those documents contain, he should sit quietly and wait for the other shoe to drop. Given Trump's close ties to Saudi Arabia and Russia, who knows? He could have been selling them those documents or sharing them with golf buddies.

item.description: @MoonPie Every moonpie ever eaten goes through a "waning gibbous" phase. Unless a particularly big bite sends it directly to a "crescent".
item.source:markdown: @MoonPie Every moonpie ever eaten goes through a "waning gibbous" phase. Unless a particularly big bite sends it directly to a "crescent".

item.description: @onewayfunction @semenov_roman_ @github Github is a private company. Your definition of "speech" is not relevant. That amendment you're thinking of starts with the phrase "Congress shall make no law...", not "Microsoft shall have no terms of service..."
item.source:markdown: @onewayfunction @semenov_roman_ @github Github is a private company. Your definition of "speech" is not relevant. That amendment you're thinking of starts with the phrase "Congress shall make no law...", not "Microsoft shall have no terms of service..."

item.description: @b05crypto Man! Twitter makes that look like a '90s video game cut scene. Have fun! Stay dry! Bet on red!
item.source:markdown: @b05crypto Man! Twitter makes that look like a '90s video game cut scene. Have fun! Stay dry! Bet on red!
